stix:STIX_Header.stix:Title: Persian Character Afghan Ministry of Defense Themed Phishing Email
stix:STIX_Header.stix:Description:
On 04 November 2014 a U.S. government department reported observing phishing emails with the UTF-8 Persian character set and a spoofed email address purporting to be from the Afghan Ministry of Defense domain.
Though the email claims to be from M.H.Safi@mod.gov.af, the SMTP sender email address was ghkjgd.hsdfh2014@yandex.ru. The email contained an attachment, but the attachment was corrupted; therefore no malware analysis could be performed.

stix:Indicator.indicator:Description:
----- BEGIN EMAIL HEADER ----- EHLO forward25m.cmail.yandex.net MAIL FROM:<ghkjgd.hsdfh2014@yandex.ru> SIZE=1616902 DATA Received: from smtp1m.mail.yandex.net (smtp1m.mail.yandex.net [77.88.61.132]) by forward25m.cmail.yandex.net (Yandex) with ESMTP id 99BE98080E for [REDACTED]; Tue, 4 Nov 2014 09:17:53 +0300 (MSK) Received: from smtp1m.mail.yandex.net (localhost [127.0.0.1]) by smtp1m.mail.yandex.net (Yandex) with ESMTP id 6FA7E6740158 for [REDACTED]; Tue, 4 Nov 2014 09:17:53 +0300 (MSK) Received: from static.FOCURED.NET (static.FOCURED.NET [158.255.0.59]) by smtp1m.mail.yandex.net (nwsmtp/Yandex) with ESMTPSA id xjIQ8JlLaN-Fc7iniNV; Tue, 4 Nov 2014 09:15:39 +0300 (using TLSv1 with cipher AES256-SHA (256/256 bits)) (Client certificate not present) X-Yandex-Uniq: 7e992130-1149-434f-bc0b-f647092781e2 DKIM-Signature: v=1; a=rsa-sha256; c=relaxed/relaxed; d=yandex.ru; s=mail; t=1415081872; bh=HBx11YcfGVgfdCh7dwK3jaH77c4lKGEqXFvEmesxdis=; h=Message-ID:From:To:Subject:Date:Mime-Version:Content-Type: X-Priority:X-MSMail-Priority:X-Mailer:X-MimeOLE; b=PdAtik5F4LXATqX2Uqn2DDEkRM/bBYt+TPCxb73Mvjvf8R10vezweh71OznCLGxBH 9336VDnCtw9BAxD4Hq5xAq/Y7pSbVfCaWawrK7wtkqByG5PWY3Le107CkQkddviHvB ihBgbmoiLIQJA/BCeuGp2j8UKN/QgnohxKYFFpJ0= Authentication-Results: smtp1m.mail.yandex.net; dkim=pass header.i=@yandex.ru Message-ID: <947306D1A1128768F460DCAF14BB97A4@pxgc> From: دګرمن مدیر نظارت <M.H.Safi@mod.gov.af> To: <[REDACTED]> Subject: وضعیت امنیتی ولسوالی وردوج بدخشان بررسی شد Date: Tue, 4 Nov 2014 14:15:26 +0800 Mime-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/mixed; boundary="----=_NextPart_000_0B53_019603DA.192CC2E0" X-Priority: 3 X-MSMail-Priority: Normal X-Mailer: Microsoft Outlook Express 6.00.2900.2180 X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2900.2180 This is a multi-part message in MIME format. ----- END EMAIL HEADER -----
